chapters.title: Prologue: Lightnings
chapters.info: Daughter-Heir (of Andor), p. 19 (9)—According to Andoran tradition, the first-born daughter of the Queen is her heir to the throne. The Daughter-Heir is traditionally sent to Tar Valon to receive training from the Aes Sedai, although until the current Daughter-Heir, Elayne, most have been too weak to get beyond novice training. See also Trakand, Elayne.
